title: chinta dhirchara (varaNam)
sahitya:
cinta dIrccarA sItA ramaNa ciru naugala shrngAra rAmA

anupallavi

 pantamElarA nE palumAru nItO bAga moraliDu bhAvameriginAdu

caraNam

 dAri teliyaka tappincu ninnu kOri vaccitini kOmaLAngi nAthA
NArinuta padmanAbha nagadharavArijAkSa shrInivAsa vEga nAdu
